```{r}
library(lubridate)
now2 <- function(){
  currentDateTime <- Sys.time()
  hh<-hour(currentDateTime)
  mm<-minute(currentDateTime)
  cat("現在是",hh,"點",mm,"分")
}
```
```{r}
now2()
now2() ->xx
```
